summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Trading Academy website including backend APIs, frontend functionality, authentication flow, and mobile responsiveness. All major features are working correctly with only minor authentication handling differences noted.

minor_issues.issue: Endpoint returns user data with session cookie authentication even when Authorization header is not provided
minor_issues.impact: Authentication works via cookies as expected, not an issue

passed_tests: Landing page loads with all sections (hero, features, testimonials, pricing)
Navigation between pages (Landing, Blog, Free Course, Individual Blog Posts)
User dashboard displays correctly with user info and membership status
Logout functionality redirects to home page
Google OAuth redirect URL generation with correct callback
Blog posts API returns 3 sample posts correctly
Individual blog post pages load correctly
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
Dark theme with blue/gold accents implemented correctly
Error handling for invalid login attempts
Error handling for non-existent blog posts
